name: ExtendedAudioFormatInfo
desc: A specifier for the kAudioFormatProperty_FormatList property, including the codec to use.

items.name: init(mASBD: AudioStreamBasicDescription, mMagicCookie: UnsafeRawPointer?, mMagicCookieSize: UInt32, mClassDescription: AudioClassDescription)
var mClassDescription: AudioClassDescription
items.desc: An AudioClassDescription struct that specifies the codec to be used.

items.name: var mMagicCookie: UnsafeRawPointer?
items.desc: Decompression information for the audio data format specified in the mASBD field.

items.name: var mMagicCookieSize: UInt32
items.desc: The size, in bytes, of the mMagicCookie field.
